Ethereum London Hard Fork

The Ethereum blockchain is scheduled to undergo London Upgrade at 5th August 2021 12:32pm UTC. The upgrade will result in a hard fork and hence there's a possibility of two temporarily two chains being created. To manage the risks around this event, We will be suspending deposits and withdrawals for ETH and ERC-20 tokens till the time situation stablises. However, there will be no impact on trading.

Set your username.

We have rolled out support for usernames. You can see your username in the profile page. Feel free to change it to something more snazzy. For now, usernames will be displayed only in leaderboards.

20th Jul, 12:00 PM UTC

Contracts discontinuation notice.

EOSBTC and XMRUSDT contracts are being discontinued. Trading in these contracts will stop at 15pm UTC on 1st June. At this time, any open positions in these contracts will be closed at the prevailing mark price.

We have changed trading fees for several contracts. After this update, our fees on USDT settled contracts are among the lowest in the industry. Complete details available here.

All USDC-settled contracts and IOTA Perpetual are being delisted. Trading in these contracts will halt at 12pm UTC, 30th April. All the USDC-settled contracts will be replaced by USDT-settled contracts prior to the delisting.Complete details available here.

BNBUSDQ perpetual contract is being discontinued. Trading will halt at 12pm UTC on 17th January. At that time, any open positions in the contract will be closed at mark price.
